subject: Re: Order #SSN4262 confirmed
description_text:
Good morning Simsonn team,

I am reaching out as I haven't received any shipping information for my
order.
Are you able to help me with this please?
Thank you.

Kind regards
Tasos

conversations.body_text: Hi Tasos Sklias,    We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused. Due to current stock shortages at our German warehouse, we will arrange an expedited shipment via UPS for you. Delivery is expected by the 20th.

Thank you very much for the speedy response.
I appreciate your assistance.

Best wishes
Tasos

Hello Simsonn team,

I am reaching out regarding my order.
Last time I contacted you on December 15 I was advised I would receive the
package on the 20th.
Ever since then the tracking is stuck on "Label Created". It's been almost
a month since my order now.
Could you please help me with this?

Kind regards,
Tasos

Στις Δευ 15 Δεκ 2025 στις 8:47 π.μ., ο/η Tasos Sklias <
ressurected21@gmail.com> έγραψε:

> Thank you very much for the speedy response.
> I appreciate your assistance.
>
> Best wishes
> Tasos
>
